Text: Hey Wanderer dude, GOG is doing a great job but you keep uploading all of their games, do you realize that you do damage GOG and all of us users who want DRM free titles? Let some people out there buy games and support  the developers and the site itself, so it continues giving us great titles in low prices and DRM free. Ok, we get it, you have lost of money and you can buy all GOG's games.

@motley666 - No one is forcing anyone to download any of the games Wanderer is uploading.  Some people, myself included, download these games to try before we spend the money on them.  I don't know about you but I don't want to spend money on a game and then find out it's a stinker and then be stuck with it.  I've purchased plenty of games from GOG and will continue to do so. 

So to Wanderer I say thank you for uploading these games to allow us the opportunity to try them out before we purchase them from GOG.
Thank you Wanderer, keep uploading nice games without DRM. CHEERS !!!!

I have said it before, if you like any of the games and you can afford it then buy it.
end of discussion please.
Thank you for this game.
@PHDIKOULAS yo mama says hello, she's gonna take a well deserved shower now that shit is sticky icky.

Wanderer, thank you very much for taking the time, and money, to purchase these titles and then upload them here for our pre-purchasing needs. I have recently downloaded, and then purchased a few of these titles. Something I would NOT have been able to do comfortably if it not had been for the option you provide to try before I buy. So again, thank you for your services. They are greatly appreciated! :)

@motley666 I never would  have bought this game. Now, I might. GOG is making massive amounts of money from the massive amounts of people that continue to purchase their games. TBH, I never bought GOG games until Wanderer posted them here. Now, I have bought around ten. Wanderer is actually helping business, if anything. 

Great upload Wanderer! I always look for your uploads and love everything you do! Keep it up, man.
